strapiPost.title: Rogers Calls For Roundabout Art
strapiPost.content:
The City of Rogers is planning to put 25 roundabouts in various places throughout Rogers and is seeking artists to submit floral designs to beautify the projects. 

  • Street art: The deadline for applications is Friday, Jan. 7 for artists to submit five designs a piece, which will potentially go in the center islands of newly constructed roundabouts. The medium will be stamped, colored concrete installed by construction teams and engineers, so a simplistic design is encouraged.
  • Community project: The compensation for selected artists will be an agreed upon price and will be available upon the final approval of designs. The final design review date is Feb. 2 and will take place after two rounds of feedback. 

For application details and project examples, click HERE.
